title: on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 (No. 40 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Property Services (Regulation)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Property Services (Regulation) 

Act 2011 (Licensing) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 11 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited property service (regulation) act 2011 (licensing) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 11 june 2025

text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Property 
Services (Regulation) Act 2011 (Licensing) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 180 of 
2012).

heading: 3. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting for
text_raw:

the table the following: 

“TABLE

(2)

title: on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 (No. 40 of
heading: 4. On the coming into operation of these Regulations, the Property Services
text_raw:
4. On the coming into operation of these Regulations, the Property Services 
(Regulation) Act 2011 (Licensing) (Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 63 
of 2024) are hereby revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Justice consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[211] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 May, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Property Services 
Regulatory Authority, 

23 May 2025. 

MICHAEL QUINLAN 
 Chairperson, Property Services Regulatory Authority, 

MAEVE HOGAN 
 Chief Executive, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [211]

title: on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 (No. 40 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 
(Licensing) Regulations 2012, as amended. They amend the licence fee payable 
in respect of applications for the different classes of licences. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [211] 5
